---
title: "WebSlides - Presentations"
---

Create professional presentation slides that can be embedded in your book or viewed standalone.

## Creating Slides

Slides use Quarto with the reveal.js format:

````markdown
---
title: "Lecture 1: Introduction"
format: revealjs
---

## First Slide

Content here

## Second Slide

- Point 1
- Point 2

## Slide with Code

```{{python}}
print("Hello, class!")
```
````

## Features

### Two-Column Layouts

```markdown
## Slide Title

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
Left column content
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
Right column content
:::

::::
```

### Incremental Lists

```markdown
## Incremental Reveal

::: {.incremental}
- First point (appears on click)
- Second point (appears on click)
- Third point (appears on click)
:::
```

### Speaker Notes

```markdown
## Slide Title

Content visible to audience

::: {.notes}
These notes only visible in presenter mode
:::
```

Press `S` during presentation to open speaker view.

## Building

```bash
pixi run quarto render WebSlides
```

Output goes to `_build/slides/`.
